name: hanging straight leg raise with elevated
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or as high as you can comfortably go. Maintain elevated form throughout.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: upright smith incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the bench to a 30-45 degree incline.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back flat against the pad and feet firmly on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Perform with upright intensity.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your upper chest, keeping your elbows slightly tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: extended style inverted row
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height or use a suspension trainer.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar or suspension trainer, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grab the bar or handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back, keeping your body straight and your heels on the ground.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the bar or handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with extended intensity.

name: dumbbell one arm fly on exercise ball improved
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your upper back is resting on the exercise ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inwards.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms. Focus on improved movement.

name: hanging straight twisting leg hip raise with compound
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards your chest, keeping them straight. Perform with compound intensity.
Step:3 Once your legs are parallel to the ground, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards that side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, but this time twist your hips to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: fast band straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing your body, and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Slowly hinge forward at your hips, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground while keeping your legs straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with fast intensity.

name: cable lateral pulldown (with rope attachment) core
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope attachment to the cable machine at a high position.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly back.
Step:5 Pull the rope down towards your sides, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Emphasize core control.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the tension and allow the rope to return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell around pullover - intensive variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your head at one end and your feet firmly on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight above your chest. Perform with intensive intensity.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head in an arc motion.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: sit-up with arms on chest with mini
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Cross your arms over your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position. Maintain mini form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: squared reverse grip machine lat pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest out and shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Maintain squared form throughout.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: targeted style single leg calf raise (on a dumbbell)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heel as high as possible, using your calf muscles. Emphasize targeted control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

name: chest and front of shoulder stretch micro
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you at shoulder height.
Step:3 Cross your arms in front of your body, with your right arm on top of your left arm.
Step:4 Interlace your fingers and press your palms together.
Step:5 Gently squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your hands forward, feeling a stretch in your chest and front of your shoulders.
Step:6 (micro variation) Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kettlebell seated press with high
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press the kettlebells overhead, fully extending your arms. Focus on high movement.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebells back to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell squat (on knees) with pure
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Place a barbell across your shoulders, gripping it with an overhand grip and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest lifted as you slowly lower your body down by bending your knees, keeping your back straight. Perform with pure intensity.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: tough cable one arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with one hand, palm facing down, and stand far enough away from the machine so that there is tension on the cable.
Step:3 Keep your arm straight and slowly raise it out to the side until it is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position. Focus on tough movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: kipping muscle up with triple
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest towards the bar, using your lats and biceps to initiate the movement. Emphasize triple control.
Step:4 Continue the upward motion until your chest reaches the bar, then transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down to the starting position by bending your arms and controlling the descent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: intermediate style kneeling plank tap shoulder (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on your toes, and lift your body into a plank position.
Step:3 (intermediate variation) Keeping your core engaged and your hips stable, lift one hand off the ground and tap the opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Return the hand to the ground and repeat with the other hand.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: intensified style kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in one hand, with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow locked and your wrist straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm. Perform with intensified intensity.

name: supine style band alternating v-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other. Focus on supine movement.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

name: assisted standing triceps extension (with towel) with horizontal
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a towel with both hands behind your head.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your ears and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 (horizontal variation) Slowly extend your forearms upward, squeezing your triceps at the top.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the towel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wall style dumbbell one arm french press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing up and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle. Focus on wall movement.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow stationary.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: side-to-side chin with reverse
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight. Perform with reverse intensity.
Step:5 Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: macro style close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position. Maintain macro form throughout.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: gentle prone twist on stability ball
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on a stability ball with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes touching the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core muscles and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Rotate your torso to one side, bringing your shoulder towards your hip. Keep your hips and legs stable throughout the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 (gentle variation) Repeat the rotation to the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable rope incline tricep extension - reverse variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a high pulley and adjust the incline bench to a comfortable angle.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the pulley with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight overhead.
Step:4 (reverse variation) Keep your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows until your forearms touch your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable squat row (with rope attachment) heavy
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 (heavy variation) Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, with your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Engage your core and pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Keep your elbows close to your body and continue pulling until your hands reach your chest.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the rope and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band vertical pallof press - seated variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and wrap the band around a sturdy object at chest height.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands and step away from the anchor point, creating tension in the band.
Step:3 Position yourself perpendicular to the anchor point, with your side facing the band.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your hands at chest height.
Step:5 Engage your core and press the band away from your chest, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly bring the band back towards your chest.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with seated intensity.

name: barbell reverse wrist curl - prone variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:2 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the barbell towards your body. Emphasize prone control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: firm style hanging oblique knee raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your knees towards your chest, twisting your torso to the side as you do so.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat on the other side, twisting your torso in the opposite direction.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize firm control.

name: horizontal dumbbell standing alternate overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 (horizontal variation) Press one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.
